definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pour in anointing, anoint (NH Aram. [[סוּךְ]] anoint);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. [[וׇסַכְתְּ]] consec. Ru 3:3; 1 s. [[סָָכְתִּי]] Da 10:3; Impf. 2 ms. [[תָּסוּח]] De 28:40, Mic 6:15; 2 fs. [[תָּסוּכִי]] 2Sa 14:2; 1 S. sf. [[וׇאֲסֻכֵַח]] Ez Eze 16:9; 3 mpl. sf. [[וַיְסֻכוּם]] 2Ch 28:15; also (prob.) 3 ms. [[וַ֫יׇּסֶח]] 2Sa 12:20 (Ges:§ 73 f.); Inf. abs. [[סוֹח]] Da 10:3; appar. Impf. pass. is [[יִיêָסח]] rd. [[יוסך]] Sam., cf. Kö:i. 436 (and not

definitions.title: Hoph.,
definitions.body: cf. Ges:l.c.);—anoint, in the toilet, oft. after washing; usu.
refl. anoint oneself, 2Sa 12:20, Ru 3:3, [[סוֹח לאׁ־סָָכְתִּי]] Da 10:3; + [[שֶׁמֶן]] as acc. mat. 2Sa 14:2, Mic 6:15, De 28:40.
pass., be poured, Ex 30:32 (P; subj. the sacred oil).
